review.title: “Small company with exciting work”
review.pros: Pros – Good raises if you're perceived as performing well (8%-10% common). The work can be very interesting. Lots of smart people work here.
review.cons: Cons – Employees don't interact directly with the customers, so the direction of projects is frequently changing. Schedules are often set without much input from those doing the work.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give more than a month notice when you plan to relocate to another city.
